intro: Miconia waimiri-atroari, commonly known as the Waimiri-Atroari miconia, is a species of flowering plant native to the Amazon rainforest. It belongs to the Melastomataceae family and is characterized by its large, glossy, dark green leaves. The plant produces clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers that are often surrounded by showy bracts. It is a shrub or small tree that can grow up to several meters in height. Due to its ornamental value and ecological importance, it plays a significant role in the biodiversity of its native habitat.
